function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Financial interests in startup companies related to the study's intellectual space","Impact":"Risk of bias or conflict of interest in the research and its findings","Mitigation":"Full disclosure of financial interests and independent peer review of the research","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, investors, readers","Owner":"Researchers, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Founding a nonprofit project providing wastewater-based health assessments","Impact":"Potential influence on research outcomes or promotion of specific findings","Mitigation":"Transparent reporting and disclosure of affiliations, as well as independent validation of research","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, public health officials, community members","Owner":"Researchers, public health officials"}]}
